titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Bingaman. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 2/11/2009--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources for the 111th Congress.
